hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select count(*) as result from core_task_agent

select ta.ID_, ta.CID_, ta.CDATE_, ta.MID_, ta.MDATE_, ta.UUID_, ta.taskDefId, ta.startDate, ta.endDate, ta.agentId, tc.processName, tb.taskName, td.displayName from core_task_agent ta left join core_processdefinition_task tb on tb.ID_ = ta.taskDefId left join core_processdefinition tc on tc.ID_ = tb.headerId left join core_user td on td.ID_ = ta.agentId where ta.CID_ = :cId

select ta.agentId from core_task_agent ta where ta.CID_ = :cId and ta.taskDefid = :taskDefId and (ta.taskId = :taskId or ((sysdate() between ta.startDate and ta.endDate) and ta.taskId = -1)) order by ta.ID_ desc limit 1
